Hands-On

Creating an virtual server to ICP

Using VirtualBox ( Windows, Linux, MAC OSX )

VirtualBox is the free option to run virtual servers in almost all OSâ€™s avaiable.

  1. Download and install the VirtualBox
    • Download VirtualBox here
    • Install VirtualBox
  2. Download ICP-LAB template
    • Download ICP-LAB template here
    • Please check MD5: 
      MD5 = 933c19541b4c41bea85cd3c9f582908a
  3. Open the ICP-LAB OVF file
    • Click in the icp-lab.ofv to open using VIRTUAL BOX
  4. Open the icp-lab-stark console
    • Login: root
    • Password: passw0rd
    • Execute 
      python install_minicloud.py

Using VMware Desktop ( Windows or Linux )

  1. Download and install the VMWARE DESKTOP Download VirtualBox here Install VMWARE DESKTOP

  2. Download ICP-LAB template Download ICP-LAB template AVAIABLE SOON!!!

  3. Open the ICP-LAB OVF file Click in the icp-lab.ofv to open using VMware Desktop

Using VMware Fusion (MAC OSX)

  1. Download and install the VMWARE FUSION Download VMWARE FUSION here Install VirtualBox

  2. Download ICP-LAB template Download ICP-LAB template AVAIABLE SOON!!!

  3. Open the ICP-LAB OVF file Click in the icp-lab.ofv to open using VMware Fusion
